text: nih kuchea avei del mcheasa robsa anak ban phdal vea hi aoy anak ampi pheap chhleasavei . haey chaur anak kom bangkeut mcheasa phe sa ng mk korp sakkar ruom cheamuoy a l laoh aoy saoh del cheaheto noam aoy anak trauv ke baoh chaul tow knong nork cheu han nam daoy kar sdeibantosa ning khleatachhngay pi kar sandosa branei robsa a l laoh
